name: Cheri Berry
description: This bright red Berry is very spicy and has a provocative flavor. It blooms with delicate, pretty flowers.

name: Chesto Berry
description: This Berry's thick skin and fruit are very tough and dry-tasting. However, every bit of it can be eaten.

name: Pecha Berry
description: Because of its hollow inside pocket, there isn't a lot to eat. What can be eaten is very sweet and delicious.

name: Rawst Berry
description: If the leaves grow longer and curlier than average, this Berry will have a somewhat bitter taste.

name: Aspear Berry
description: This Berry's peel is hard, but the flesh inside is very juicy. It is distinguished by its bracing sourness.

name: Leppa Berry
description: It takes longer to grow than Berries such as Cheri. The smaller Berries taste better.

name: Oran Berry
description: Nature's gifts came together as one in this Berry. It has a wondrous mix of flavors that spread in the mouth.

name: Persim Berry
description: The more this Berry absorbs energy from sunlight, the more vividly colorful it grows.

name: Lum Berry
description: This Berry's gradual process of storing nutrients beneficial to Pokémon health causes it to mature slowly.

name: Sitrus Berry
description: Sitrus came from the same family as Oran. It is larger and smoother-tasting than Oran.

name: Figy Berry
description: This Berry is oddly shaped, appearing as if someone took a bite out of it. It is packed full of spicy substances.

name: Wiki Berry
description: It is said that this Berry grew lumps to help Pokémon grip it, allowing propagation farther afield.

name: Mago Berry
description: This Berry progressively curves as it grows. The curvier the Berry, the sweeter it tastes.

name: Aguav Berry
description: This Berry turns bitter toward the stem. The dainty flower it grows from doesn't absorb much sunlight.

name: Iapapa Berry
description: This Berry is very big and sour. The juiciness of the pulp accentuates the sourness.

name: Razz Berry
description: A small hint of spiciness lingers in the red granules surrounding this Berry. Their centers have a dry taste.

name: Bluk Berry
description: Though this small, delicately skinned Berry is blue in color, it dyes the mouth black when eaten.

name: Nanab Berry
description: Bitter, but with a trace of sweetness, the Nanab Berry was the seventh to be discovered in the world.

name: Wepear Berry
description: The potent mix of bitter and sour in this Berry seems to promote digestion. The flower is white and beautiful.

name: Pinap Berry
description: It is said that when the sour skin is peeled, this spicy Berry can be crushed to make medicine.

name: Pomeg Berry
description: When this sweetly spicy Berry's thick skin is peeled, many pieces of the fruit spill out.

name: Kelpsy Berry
description: This Berry can be eaten as is or boiled to obtain an extract that adds a dash of flavor to food.

name: Qualot Berry
description: Even in places of constant rain and high humidity, this Berry's plant grows healthy and strong.

name: Hondew Berry
description: This somewhat-rare Berry projects an image of luxury, so it is favored as a gift item.

name: Grepa Berry
description: One bite of this very tender Berry fills the mouth with its sweet and tangy flavor.

name: Tamato Berry
description: This Berry is large and spicy. When eaten during the cold season, it warms the body from inside.

name: Cornn Berry
description: Its dryness is quite strong. As a result, its true deliciousness can't be appreciated by just eating one or two.

name: Magost Berry
description: The grown-up flavor and dreamy sweetness of this Berry make it a favorite of Pokémon everywhere.

name: Rabuta Berry
description: Even though this Berry is bitter, it should be eaten peel and all. The hair on the peel cleans the stomach from the inside.

name: Nomel Berry
description: This Berry is quite sour overall, with the sourness especially concentrated at the pointed end.

name: Spelon Berry
description: So spicy is the Spelon Berry that, Fire type or not, Pokémon will try to breathe fire after eating a single one.

name: Pamtre Berry
description: This Berry drifted from a faraway sea. It is now cultivated in the Sinnoh region.

name: Watmel Berry
description: A bounty of nature that is exceedingly sweet. The Berry is huge, with some discovered that exceed 20 inches.

name: Durin Berry
description: This Berry is tremendously bitter. Just one bite is enough to instantly stop hiccups.

name: Belue Berry
description: This glossy and colorful Berry has a mouthwateringly delicious appearance. However, it is awfully sour.

name: Occa Berry
description: This Berry is said to have grown plentiful in the tropics of the past. It boasts an intensely hot spiciness.

name: Passho Berry
description: This Berry's flesh is dotted with countless tiny bubbles of air that keep it afloat in water.

name: Wacan Berry
description: Energy from lightning strikes is drawn into the plant, making the Berries grow big and rich.

name: Rindo Berry
description: This Berry has a disagreeable green flavor and scent typical of vegetables. It is rich in health-promoting fiber.

name: Yache Berry
description: This Berry has a refreshing flavor that strikes a good balance of dryness and sourness. It tastes better chilled.

name: Chople Berry
description: This Berry contains a substance that generates heat. It can even heat up a chilly heart.

name: Kebia Berry
description: This Berry is a brilliant green on the outside. Inside, it is packed with a dry-flavored, black-colored flesh.

name: Shuca Berry
description: The sweetness-laden pulp has just the hint of a hard-edged and fragrant bite to it.

name: Coba Berry
description: This Berry is said to be a new kind that is a cross of two Berries brought together by winds from far away.

name: Payapa Berry
description: This Berry is said to sense danger and can react to hostile thoughts. It is usually a little bitter.

name: Tanga Berry
description: Although the Tanga Berry has a very appealing appearance, it is sour enough to cause harsh tongue pain.

name: Charti Berry
description: The Charti Berry's tough skin can be quite hard to eat. It is known to have an earthy flavor.

name: Kasib Berry
description: The Kasib Berry has a mysterious taste. It's been said that even those who dislike it can grow to enjoy it.

name: Haban Berry
description: This Berry is loved for its appealing mix of sweetness and tartness, though it can leave a dry aftertaste.

name: Colbur Berry
description: This Berry is known for its oily texture and slightly bitter flavor. It's difficult to cultivate.

name: Babiri Berry
description: The Babiri Berry is extremely tough. Its durable skin makes it resistant to all but the sharpest of bites.

name: Chilan Berry
description: This Berry has a neutral taste. It isn't overly sweet or sour, but many appreciate its simplicity.

name: Liechi Berry
description: The Liechi Berry is renowned for its powerful flavor, which can be quite overwhelming. It is rare and difficult to grow.

name: Ganlon Berry
description: This Berry's taste starts out sour but becomes increasingly sweet as it ripens. It requires careful cultivation.

name: Salac Berry
description: The Salac Berry's spicy flavor is both fiery and invigorating. It is said to heighten alertness.

name: Petaya Berry
description: Petaya Berries are prized for their sweetness, though their unusual shape can make them tricky to eat.

name: Apicot Berry
description: This Berry has a tangy flavor that leaves a lingering taste on the palate. It is hard to cultivate.

name: Lansat Berry
description: The Lansat Berry's mild flavor is appreciated by many. However, its flavor can vary widely based on growing conditions.

name: Starf Berry
description: This Berry has a bold, bitter flavor that some find off-putting. It's highly prized by Pokémon for its rarity.

name: Enigma Berry
description: This Berry has an otherworldly flavor that changes with each bite. It's extremely rare and difficult to find.

name: Micle Berry
description: This Berry has a very dry flavor. It has the effect of making other food eaten at the same time taste sweet.

name: Custap berry
description: The flesh underneath the Custap Berry's tough skin is sweet and creamy soft.

name: Jaboca Berry
description: The cluster of drupelets that make up this Berry pop rhythmically if the Berry is handled roughly.

name: Rowap Berry
description: In days of old, people worked the top-shaped pieces of this Berry free and used them as toys.

name: Roseli Berry
description: The slight bitterness that cuts through the rich sweetness makes this Berry a perfect ingredient for adding an accent.
